showScoreExcerpt:
The current Broadway production staged by Lear deBessonet, artistic director of New York City Center Encores! and founder of The Public Theaterâ€™s Public Works program at the Delacorte, may be the most definitive of them all. While the Encores! production at City Center in May seemed a bit unfinished with its approximately one week of rehearsals, the Broadway transfer has smoothed out those issues and turned into a true ensemble. The new leads have fit themselves so well into the production that with three substitutions at the performance under review it was still a very polished performance.
